jalds.alds.ds.tree
Class SimpleBinaryTree

java.lang.Object
  jalds.alds.ds.tree.BinaryTree
      jalds.alds.ds.tree.SimpleBinaryTree

public class SimpleBinaryTree
extends BinaryTree

A very simple implementation of the Binary Tree, it hopes all the elements are inserted in a random order, if elements are inserted in a random order into a binary tree the height of the tree will be approximately O(n log n) but things are rarely random in the real world.

Author:
Devender Gollapally

deleteNodeWithValue

public void deleteNodeWithValue(int value)
Deletes the first node which has the given value.
  • Find the Node which has the given value
  • If the Node is the root node then delete the root
  • Else if the Node has no children then set the Parent of this node's link to child as null.
  • Else if the Node has only one child, move the child to the parent
  • If the Node has both children

Specified by:
deleteNodeWithValue in class BinaryTree
